name: CUBE (itch) (tythedodo)
description:
Game Description:

This game is a challenging game with a simple objective: to collect the points.  What makes this game so different from others like it is the steep learning curve to overcome when just starting the game.  Don't get discouraged if you're not immediately amazing at the game.  After a few tries, you will start to get the hang of the controls and you may even develop your own strategy / play style.  Starting at 11 points, you unlock a new color every 10 points after.  This color is changed by clicking your "high score" in the main menu.  Due to the difficulty of the game, each and every color you unlock will feel like a great accomplishment!  Any players worthy enough to make it to 100 score will be handsomely rewarded.  with what you might ask?  Well you'll just have to wait and see. ;)

My Story:

I started this project while one simple goal in mind: not to get rich or famous, but to earn enough money to buy a new laptop. The one I have right now is pretty bad and struggles to preform a lot of basic tasks. The reason why I'm now looking for supporters is because I need a new laptop, so I can continue to make more games for my followers. With a new laptop, I can continue to create games in less than half the time it normally takes with this one. My end goal would be to hopefully someday put together a full team of game developers (since I am currently the only member), and develop great indie games for many years to come!
